data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Abies alba (Silver fir) from sample AUBAS-72

Exposition N, Slope 35 deg, Geology: Granit, Blockschutt, Tree line 2000 m, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 60%, Herb cover 75%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Rhododendro ferruginei-Abietetum, Film number: 486A
